rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage with reinforced concrete design and ample parking space. Walls are built using exposed concrete blocks as per Brutalist aesthetic.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area combined with kitchen, featuring rugged textures, exposed brick walls, and natural light from large windows. Includes integrated seating areas and a functional dining space.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Cozy library space designed in the Brutalist style with concrete bookshelves and ample lighting to create an inspiring atmosphere, respecting Vastu guidelines for knowledge accumulation on the North-West side of the ground floor.

rooms.name: Washroom
rooms.description: Utility washroom located adjacent to kitchen/living area with basic fixtures. Designed in a minimalistic style.

openings.description: Main entrance featuring a robust concrete archway, aligned with Vastu principles to promote positive energy flow from the North.
Large window openings ensuring natural light and ventilation in the open-plan living area.
Garage door that provides secure access to the two-car garage.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom designed with Brutalist elements using raw concrete finishes and ample storage. North-facing orientation for a calming ambience.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Spacious secondary bedroom featuring exposed concrete walls, modern fixtures, and south-east facing to adhere to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom space with raw finishes and functional design, ideally located in the east for a harmonious energy flow.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Comprehensive bathroom suite adjoining the master bedroom, designed with clean lines and practicality.

openings.description: Large window openings for natural light and ventilation in the master bedroom.
Balcony access from Bedroom 2 providing outdoor space and adherence to Vastu principles of open circulation.
